property.name: UsefulPositive
property.formula: (select SUM(U.PositiveValue) from UsefulnessEntry U where U.EntityId = Id and U.EntityType = 'UsefulTestEntity')

property.name: UsefulNegative
property.formula: (select SUM(U.NegativeValue) from UsefulnessEntry U where U.EntityId = Id and U.EntityType = 'UsefulTestEntity')
